data.title: Rational Software Modeler, Version 7.0
data.meta_description: This document describes how to download and assemble IBM Rational Software Modeler, Version 7.0 by using the Passport Advantage Online Web site.
data.text:
Download

Abstract

This document describes how to download and assemble IBM Rational Software Modeler, Version 7.0 by using the Passport Advantage Online Web site.

Prerequisites

System requirements can be found in their respective installation guides or at the URL listed below.

[{"PRLabel":"Rational Software Modeler system requirements","PRLang":"English","PRSize":"23654","PRPlat":{"label":"Windows","code":"PF033"},"PRURL":"http://www.ibm.com/software/awdtools/modeler/swmodeler/sysreq/index.html"}]

Installation Instructions

For an overview of the installation process, see the Quick Start Guide. For complete instructions, refer to the Installation Guide (install.html), which is located in the disk1\documentation directory in the directory where you extracted RSM_V7.0_Part_1.zip (and the other parts) for Rational Software Modeler, Version 7.0.

You can find the most recent version of the Installation Guide online at the URL below.

[{"INLabel":"Installation Guide","INLang":"English","INSize":"148972","INURL":"http://download.boulder.ibm.com/ibmdl/pub/software/rationalsdp/v7/rsm/70/docs/install_instruction/install.html"}]

Off

[{"DNLabel":"Access Passport Advantage Online","DNDate":"12/5/2006","DNLang":"English","DNSize":"23455","DNPlat":{"label":"Windows","code":"PF033"},"DNURL":"http://www.ibm.com/software/howtobuy/passportadvantage/pao_customers.htm","DNURL_FTP":null,"DDURL":null}]

Technical Support

IBM Rational Software Support provides you with technical assistance.

For contact information and guidelines or reference materials that you will need when you require support, read the IBM Software Support Handbook at http://techsupport.services.ibm.com/guides/handbook.html.

For FAQs, lists of known problems and fixes, and other support information, visit the product support page for Rational Software Modeler at www.ibm.com/software/awdtools/modeler/swmodeler/support/index.html.

For product news, events, and other information, visit the product home page for Rational Software Modeler at www.ibm.com/software/awdtools/modeler/swmodeler/index.html.

Before you contact IBM Rational Software Support, gather the background information that you will need to describe your problem. When describing a problem to an IBM software support specialist, be as specific as possible and include all relevant background information so that the specialist can help you solve the problem efficiently. To save time, know the answers to these questions:

What software versions were you running when the problem occurred?

Do you have logs, traces, or messages that are related to the problem?

Can you reproduce the problem? If so, what steps do you take to reproduce it?

Is there a workaround for the problem? If so, be prepared to describe the workaround.
